snippet: The speaker of the House of Representatives was accused of seeking kickbacks from an American-owned mining company in exchange for helping it extend its operating contract.
abstract: Indonesia's speaker of House of Representatives Setya Novanto resigns after he is accused of seeking kickbacks from American-owned mining company Freeport Indonesia  in exchange for helping it extend its contract.
lead_paragraph: The speaker of the House of Representatives was accused of seeking kickbacks from an American-owned mining company in exchange for helping it extend its operating contract.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Indonesia: Speaker Quits Over Scandal
